verses.verse: שְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> she-Ma' Hear יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, O Israel אַתָּ֨ה <WH859> 'at-Tah You עֹבֵ֤ר <WH5674> 'o-Ver Thou [art] to pass over הַיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> hai-yOm this day אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> hai-yar-Den, Jordan לָבֹא֙ <WH935> la-Vo to go in לָרֶ֣שֶׁת <WH3423> la-Re-shet to possess גּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> go-Yim, nations גְּדֹלִ֥ים <WH1419> ge-do-Lim greater וַעֲצֻמִ֖ים <WH6099> va-'a-tzu-Mim and mightier מִמֶּ֑ךָּ <WH4480> mi-Me-ka; than עָרִ֛ים <WH5892> 'a-Rim than thyself cities גְּדֹלֹ֥ת <WH1419> ge-do-Lot great וּבְצֻרֹ֖ת <WH1219> u-ve-tzu-Rot and fenced up בַּשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> bash-sha-Ma-yim. to heaven

עַֽם־ <WH5971> 'am- A people גָּד֥וֹל <WH1419> ga-Dol great וָרָ֖ם <WH7311> va-Ram and tall בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei the children עֲנָקִ֑ים <WH6062> 'a-na-Kim; of the Anakims אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom אַתָּ֤ה <WH859> 'at-Tah you יָדַ֙עְתָּ֙ <WH3045> ya-Da'-ta whom thou knowest וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah you שָׁמַ֔עְתָּ <WH8085> sha-Ma'-ta, and [of whom] thou hast heard מִ֣י <WH4310> mi Who יִתְיַצֵּ֔ב <WH3320> yit-yatz-Tzev, [say] Who can stand לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> lif-Nei before בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei the children עֲנָֽק׃ <WH6061> 'a-Nak. of Anak

וְיָדַעְתָּ֣ <WH3045> ve-ya-da'-Ta Understand הַיּ֗וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom, therefore this day כִּי֩ <WH3588> ki that it יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> Yah-weh that the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God הֽוּא־ <WH1931> hu- who הָעֹבֵ֤ר <WH5674> ha-'o-Ver [is] he which goeth over לְפָנֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH6440> le-fa-Nei-cha before אֵ֣שׁ <WH784> 'esh fire אֹֽכְלָ֔ה <WH398> 'o-che-Lah, thee [as] a consuming ה֧וּא <WH1931> hu He יַשְׁמִידֵ֛ם <WH8045> yash-mi-Dem he shall destroy וְה֥וּא <WH1931> ve-Hu and He יַכְנִיעֵ֖ם <WH3665> yach-ni-'Em them and he shall bring them down לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <WH6440> le-fa-Nei-cha; before thy face וְהֽוֹרַשְׁתָּ֤ם <WH3423> ve-ho-rash-Tam so shalt thou drive them out וְהַֽאַבַדְתָּם֙ <WH6> ve-ha-'a-vad-Tam and destroy מַהֵ֔ר <WH4118> ma-Her, them quickly כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> dib-Ber hath said יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh as the LORD לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תֹּאמַ֣ר <WH559> to-Mar Speak בִּלְבָבְךָ֗ <WH3824> bil-va-ve-Cha, not thou in thine heart בַּהֲדֹ֣ף <WH1920> ba-ha-Dof hath cast them out יְהוָה֩ <WH3068> Yah-weh after that the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֨יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God אֹתָ֥ם׀ <WH853> 'o-Tam מִלְּפָנֶיךָ֮ <WH6440> mil-le-fa-nei-Cha from before לֵאמֹר֒ <WH559> le-Mor thee saying בְּצִדְקָתִי֙ <WH6666> be-tzid-ka-Ti For my righteousness הֱבִיאַ֣נִי <WH935> he-vi-'A-ni hath brought me in יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, the LORD לָרֶ֖שֶׁת <WH3423> la-Re-shet to possess אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz this land הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> haz-Zot; likewise וּבְרִשְׁעַת֙ <WH3423> u-ve-rish-'At doth drive them out הַגּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> hag-go-Yim of these nations הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh, of these יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD מוֹרִישָׁ֥ם <WH7564> mo-ri-Sham but for the wickedness מִפָּנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6440> mip-pa-Nei-cha. from before

לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo for בְצִדְקָתְךָ֗ <WH6666> ve-tzid-ka-te-Cha, Not for thy righteousness וּבְיֹ֙שֶׁר֙ <WH3476> u-ve-Yo-sher or for the uprightness לְבָ֣בְךָ֔ <WH3824> le-Va-ve-cha, of thine heart אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> 'at-Tah you בָ֖א <WH935> va dost thou go לָרֶ֣שֶׁת <WH3423> la-Re-shet to possess אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אַרְצָ֑ם <WH776> 'ar-Tzam; their land כִּ֞י <WH3588> ki because בְּרִשְׁעַ֣ת׀ <WH3423> be-rish-'At doth drive them out הַגּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> hag-go-Yim of these nations הָאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh, of these יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God מוֹרִישָׁ֣ם <WH7564> mo-ri-Sham but for the wickedness מִפָּנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> mip-pa-Nei-cha, from before וּלְמַ֜עַן <WH4616> u-le-Ma-'an order הָקִ֣ים <WH6965> ha-Kim thee and that he may perform אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַדָּבָ֗ר <WH1697> had-da-Var, the word אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which נִשְׁבַּ֤ע <WH7650> nish-Ba' sware יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD לַאֲבֹתֶ֔יךָ <WH1> la-'a-vo-Tei-cha, unto thy fathers לְאַבְרָהָ֥ם <WH85> le-'av-ra-Ham] Abraham לְיִצְחָ֖ק <WH3327> le-yitz-Chak] Isaac וּֽלְיַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> u-le-ya-'a-ko.] and Jacob

וְיָדַעְתָּ֗ <WH3045> ve-ya-da'-Ta, Understand כִּ֠י <WH3588> ki for לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo because בְצִדְקָֽתְךָ֙ <WH6666> ve-tzid-ka-te-Cha it for thy righteousness יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh therefore that the LORD אֱ֠לֹהֶיךָ <WH430> 'E-lo-hei-cha thy God נֹתֵ֨ן <WH5414> no-Ten giveth לְךָ֜ le-Cha אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָ֧רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz land הַטּוֹבָ֛ה <WH2896> hat-to-Vah thee not this good הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> haz-Zot likewise לְרִשְׁתָּ֑הּ <WH3423> le-rish-Tah; to possess כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for עַם־ <WH5971> 'am- people קְשֵׁה־ <WH7186> ke-sheh- churlish עֹ֖רֶף <WH6203> 'O-ref stiff-necked אָֽתָּה׃ <WH859> 'At-tah. you

זְכֹר֙ <WH2142> ze-Chor Remember אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תִּשְׁכַּ֔ח <WH7911> tish-Kach, [and] forget אֵ֧ת <WH853> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- you הִקְצַ֛פְתָּ <WH7107> hik-Tzaf-ta to wrath אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh not how thou provokedst the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> bam-mid-Bar; in the wilderness לְמִן־ <WH4480> le-min- from הַיּ֞וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom the day אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- you יָצָ֣אתָ׀ <WH3318> ya-Tza-ta that thou didst depart out מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz of the land מִצְרַ֗יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- until בֹּֽאֲכֶם֙ <WH935> bo-'a-Chem until ye came עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- until הַמָּק֣וֹם <WH4725> ham-ma-Kom unto this place הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh, this מַמְרִ֥ים <WH4784> mam-Rim ye have been rebellious הֱיִיתֶ֖ם <WH1961> he-yi-Tem have been עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- against יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD

וּבְחֹרֵ֥ב <WH2722> u-ve-cho-Rev Also in Horeb הִקְצַפְתֶּ֖ם <WH7107> hik-tzaf-Tem to wrath אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; the LORD וַיִּתְאַנַּ֧ף <WH599> vai-yit-'an-Naf was angry יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh so that the LORD בָּכֶ֖ם ba-Chem לְהַשְׁמִ֥יד <WH8045> le-hash-Mid with you to have destroyed אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853> 'et-Chem.

בַּעֲלֹתִ֣י <WH5927> ba-'a-lo-Ti When I was gone up הָהָ֗רָה <WH2022> ha-Ha-rah, into the mount לָקַ֜חַת <WH3947> la-Ka-chat to receive לוּחֹ֤ת <WH3871> lu-Chot the tables הָֽאֲבָנִים֙ <WH68> ha-'a-va-Nim of stone לוּחֹ֣ת <WH3871> lu-Chot [even] the tables הַבְּרִ֔ית <WH1285> hab-be-Rit, of the covenant אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which כָּרַ֥ת <WH3772> ka-Rat made יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD עִמָּכֶ֑ם <WH5973> 'im-ma-Chem; with וָאֵשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> va-'e-Shev with you then I abode בָּהָ֗ר <WH2022> ba-Har, in the mount אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> 'ar-ba-'Im forty יוֹם֙ <WH3117> yOm days וְאַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> ve-'ar-ba-'Im and forty לַ֔יְלָה <WH3915> Lay-lah, nights לֶ֚חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem bread לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo neither אָכַ֔לְתִּי <WH398> 'a-Chal-ti, I neither did eat וּמַ֖יִם <WH4325> u-Ma-yim water לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo nor שָׁתִֽיתִי׃ <WH8354> sha-Ti-ti. nor drink

וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> vai-yit-Ten delivered יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֵלַ֗י <WH413> 'e-Lai, about אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁנֵי֙ <WH8147> she-Nei unto me two לוּחֹ֣ת <WH3871> lu-Chot tables הָֽאֲבָנִ֔ים <WH68> ha-'a-va-Nim, of stone כְּתֻבִ֖ים <WH3789> ke-tu-Vim written בְּאֶצְבַּ֣ע <WH676> be-'etz-Ba' with the finger אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> E-lo-Him; of God וַעֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH5921> va-'a-lei-Hem, and on כְּֽכָל־ <WH3605> ke-chol- them all הַדְּבָרִ֡ים <WH1697> had-de-va-Rim and on them [was written] according to all the words אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which דִּבֶּר֩ <WH1696> dib-Ber spake יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD עִמָּכֶ֥ם <WH5973> 'im-ma-Chem at בָּהָ֛ר <WH2022> ba-Har with you in the mount מִתּ֥וֹךְ <WH8432> mit-Toch out of the midst הָאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> ha-'Esh of the fire בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom in the day הַקָּהָֽל׃ <WH6951> hak-ka-Hal. of the assembly

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> vay-Hi, came מִקֵּץ֙ <WH7093> mik-Ketz And it came to pass at the end אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> 'ar-ba-'Im of forty י֔וֹם <WH3117> Yom, days וְאַרְבָּעִ֖ים <WH705> ve-'ar-ba-'Im and forty לָ֑יְלָה <WH3915> La-ye-lah; nights נָתַ֨ן <WH5414> na-Tan gave יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh [that] the LORD אֵלַ֗י <WH413> 'e-Lai, about אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁנֵ֛י <WH8147> she-Nei me the two לֻחֹ֥ת <WH3871> lu-Chot tables הָאֲבָנִ֖ים <WH68> ha-'a-va-Nim of stone לֻח֥וֹת <WH3871> lu-Chot [even] the tables הַבְּרִֽית׃ <WH1285> hab-be-Rit. of the covenant

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֵלַ֗י <WH413> 'e-Lai, to me ק֣וּם <WH6965> kum unto me Arise רֵ֤ד <WH3381> red get thee down מַהֵר֙ <WH4118> ma-Her quickly מִזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> miz-Zeh, here כִּ֚י <WH3588> ki for שִׁחֵ֣ת <WH7843> shi-Chet have corrupted עַמְּךָ֔ <WH5971> 'am-me-Cha, from hence for thy people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom הוֹצֵ֖אתָ <WH3318> ho-Tze-ta which thou hast brought forth מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> mi-mitz-Ra-yim; out of Egypt סָ֣רוּ <WH5493> Sa-ru turned aside מַהֵ֗ר <WH4118> ma-Her, [themselves] they are quickly מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הַדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <WH1870> had-De-rech out of the way אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which צִוִּיתִ֔ם <WH6680> tziv-vi-Tim, which I commanded עָשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> 'a-Su them they have made לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem מַסֵּכָֽה׃ <WH4541> mas-se-Chah. them a molten image

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh Furthermore the LORD אֵלַ֣י <WH413> 'e-Lai about לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; unto me saying רָאִ֙יתִי֙ <WH7200> ra-'I-ti I have seen אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> ha-'Am this people הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh, this וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and indeed עַם־ <WH5971> 'am- people קְשֵׁה־ <WH7186> ke-sheh- churlish עֹ֖רֶף <WH6203> 'O-ref stiff-necked הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> Hu. he

הֶ֤רֶף <WH7503> He-ref Let me alone מִמֶּ֙נִּי֙ <WH4480> mi-Men-ni than וְאַשְׁמִידֵ֔ם <WH8045> ve-'ash-mi-Dem, that I may destroy וְאֶמְחֶ֣ה <WH4229> ve-'em-Cheh them and blot out אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁמָ֔ם <WH8034> she-Mam, their name מִתַּ֖חַת <WH8478> mit-Ta-chat under הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim; from under heaven וְאֶֽעֱשֶׂה֙ <WH6213> ve-'e-'e-Seh and I will make אֽוֹתְךָ֔ <WH854> 'ot-Cha, of לְגוֹי־ <WH1471> le-goy- thee a nation עָצ֥וּם <WH6099> 'a-Tzum mightier וָרָ֖ב <WH7227> va-Rav and greater מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu. than

וָאֵ֗פֶן <WH6437> va-'E-fen, So I turned וָֽאֵרֵד֙ <WH3381> va-'e-Red and came down מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הָהָ֔ר <WH2022> ha-Har, from the mount וְהָהָ֖ר <WH2022> ve-ha-Har and the mount בֹּעֵ֣ר <WH1197> bo-'Er burned בָּאֵ֑שׁ <WH784> ba-'Esh; with fire וּשְׁנֵי֙ <WH8147> u-she-Nei and the two לֻחֹ֣ת <WH3871> lu-Chot tables הַבְּרִ֔ית <WH1285> hab-be-Rit, of the covenant עַ֖ל <WH5921> 'al were in שְׁתֵּ֥י <WH8147> she-Tei [were] in my two יָדָֽי׃ <WH3027> ya-Dai. hands
